short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Closes all open media tabs (OTT, social media) and creates an empty tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The websites that are closed with this extension are - netflix, hotstar, linkedin, twitter, instagram, prime, sonyliv, youtube, facebook, disney. It is really helpful in increasing productivity and reducing ram wastage of the system.
